summary: Implements the DCOM-based Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) protocol over DCE/RPC, providing Python representations of WMI interfaces, objects, enumerators, qualifiers, and method signatures, and handling encoding, decoding, and remote invocation of WMI operations such as class/instance management, queries, method execution, and event notifications.
business_intent: Enable remote system management, automation, and security testing of Windows environments by exposing a programmable interface to interact with WMI services over DCE/RPC, allowing enumeration, creation, modification, execution, and monitoring of CIM objects.
